ThingDef.label: M3 pattern tech armor
ThingDef.description: After Pearl Technica acquired the rights to manufacture all the URMC's Synth needs; they produced the M3 Tech armor and M10 tech helmet. Borrowing heavily from the original gear and adding Synth control support. The armor of the M3 Tech is identical to the M3 Personal with added bandwidth capabilities. This allows Tech Marines to operate within Other Marine units or on their own both with Synth support.

ThingDef.label: M3-S tech scout armor
ThingDef.description: A custom modified set of M3 Armor designed for recon missions. Allows more mobility for the wearer.

Iconic Pearl Tech lab attire, when colonists see staff dressed like this they rest assured that science is being taken serious and with the highest respect for safety. The clean and efficient Pearl Tech science gear helps boost a lab techs ability to synthesize drugs and conduct research.
ThingDef.label: Pearl Tech Lab Coveralls

The Lab HUD is the epitome of Pearl Tech lab gear. The HUD helps lab techs track anything from drug cook times to research projects to when to take your mandated 2 minute break. Usually worn by lead lab techs but affluent labs will outfit all their techs with this gear.
ThingDef.label: Pearl Tech Lab HUD
PT type 102 EMP charge lance
ThingDef.description: Pearl tech was founded to analyze, profit from and destroy Mechanoids. The type 102 embodies this approach to its core. Not only does it pack a punch it also discharges an EMP blast stunning most mechanoids. If the shot doesn't kill it the marines closing the distance while its stunned will.

ThingDef.label: PT type 66 EMP rifle
ThingDef.description: Like most Pearl Tech equipment it is largely stolen from other things; in this case the pulse rifle, now with added EMP effect. Unlike the pulse rifle these were commissioned with the purpose of putting down rogue synths from earlier generations like the [REDACTED] human like synths.

ThingDef.label: PT type 42 EMP SMG
ThingDef.description: Like most Pearl Tech equipment it is largely stolen from other things; in this case the pulse SMG, now with added EMP effect. Unlike the type 66 the type 42 is meant for Tech Marines to feel comfortable commanding a group of synths. Although there have been no CONFIRMED Pearl tech synth rebellions, so far.

ThingDef.label: PT EMP lacerator
ThingDef.description: S12 Combat Machete The Tech Lacerator is just a S12 Combat Machete with battery attached to it, is what URMC marines would tell you. What the knuckle draggers don't know is the amount of time and precise fabrication that goes into making them without harming the user. That being said it is just a battery attached to a S12 Combat Machete.

ThingDef.label: pearl tech bandwidth enhancer
ThingDef.description: The Bandwidth Enhancer from Pearl Technica provides 12 extra bandwidth

ThingDef.label: pearl technica banner
ThingDef.description: Pearl Tech Banner meant to be installed in key locations for maximum customer satisfaction.

ResearchProjectDef.label: URMC pearl technica tier 2
ResearchProjectDef.description: Pearl Technica advanced colony modules and military

ThingDef.label: EMP grenades
ThingDef.description: EMP Grenades are the bane of Mechanoids everywhere; they have also proven useful when a synth has a unforeseen malfunction, which as defiantly never happened. Trusted usually to Tech Marines to avoid accidental power outages. It is set to detonate in 5 seconds. These are meant to use with the Marine Pearl Tech armors.
